description: A service network is a logical boundary for a collection of services. You can associate services and VPCs with a service network.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^(?!servicenetwork-)(?![-])(?!.*[-]$)(?!.*[-]{2})[a-z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

AuthType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | AWS_IAM  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:servicenetwork/sn-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedAt.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 20  
Pattern: ^sn-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LastUpdatedAt.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
